CustomField.description: Comments or notes when closing a case.
CustomField.label: Closure Remarks

value.fullName: Approval awaited and customer informed of the TAT
value.label: Approval awaited and customer informed of the TAT

value.fullName: NOC not issued as the account is not regular
value.label: NOC not issued as the account is not regular

value.label: EMI not revised as per internal processed

value.label: ROI offer extended over the counter

value.label: Scan copy not available with CPC
